resources.string: Beagles are a compact, friendly scent hound breed, known for their short, tricolored coats, floppy ears, and keen sense of smell.
The Groenendael, The Tervueren, The Laekenois and The Malinois
Belgian Shepherds are a versatile, intelligent, and energetic herding breed known for their loyalty and protective nature.
Boxers are a medium to large, short-haired dog breed known for their muscular build, square-shaped head, and smooth coat.
American, French, English, Olde English Bulldogge, Dogue de Bordeaux, etc.
Bulldogs are characterized by their short, muscular build, wrinkled face, and distinctive, slightly upturned snout.
Collie is a medium to large breed of dog, recognized for its long, elegant coat, intelligence and loyalty.
The Cardigan Welsh and Pembroke Welsh Corgi
Corgis are small to medium-sized, low-set herding dogs with short legs and a long, stocky body, known for their affectionate and loyal personalities
German Pinscher, Old German Shepherd, Rottweiler
Doberman Pinschers are a sleek, powerful breed known for their intelligence, loyalty, and protective nature.
German Shepherds are renowned for their intelligence, loyalty, and trainability, making them a popular choice for various roles, including working dogs, guide dogs, and family pets
Golden Retrievers are known for their golden-brown coat, gentle nature, and intelligence.
Siberian, Alaskan. Mackenzie River, Greenland, East Siberian
Siberian Huskies are medium-sized, athletic dogs known for their endurance and thick, double coat.
Labrador Retrievers are known for their sturdy, muscular build, short, dense, water-repellent coat, and "otter-like" tail
Poodles are known for their intelligence, athleticism, and distinctive curly coat.
The Rottweiler is a muscular, robust and very strong dog, known for its black coat with rust markings.
The Shiba Inu is a medium-sized, agile dog breed originating in Japan. It was originally bred and developed as a hunting dog, and is therefore capable of handling mountainous terrain.
